Class MaxSubarraySum.Result

java.lang.Object
MaxSubarraySum.Result
Enclosing class:
MaxSubarraySum
public static class MaxSubarraySum.Result extends Object
Stores the starting index, ending index and max sum of the contiguous subarray within an original array.
Author:
Chris Silva

This program generates the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray from a user-defined array using Kadane's Algorithm.

    static MaxSubarraySum.Result
    findMaxSubarraySum(int[] inputArray)

    • Result

      public Result(int startIdx, int endIdx, int maxSum)

  • Method Details

    • findMaxSubarraySum

      public static MaxSubarraySum.Result findMaxSubarraySum(int[] inputArray)
      Returns the maximum contiguous subarray using Kadane's Algorithm, which runs in O(n) time and uses O(1) space.
      Parameters:
      inputArray - array of integers expected as input
      Returns:
      the resulting subarray containing the max sum with its beginning and ending indices
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entered array is empty
